name: Turn the Tide (Harrisandwich, errol333, JD2895, Goondrious, IsAnElegy)
name_original: Turn the Tide (Harrisandwich, errol333, JD2895, Goondrious, IsAnElegy)
description:
Timmy and Olly are an unlikely duo!


Timmy the Turtle    is short and heavy. He can't jump over obstacles or pits but he is resistant to hazards!


Olly the Octopus    is tall and nimble. He can stick to his friend to help carry them over obstacles but unfortunately  he's weak to hazards.

** Use their unique skills together to turn the tides and make it to the goals! **

--- Controls: ---

A  or  Left Arrow - Move Left
D  or  Right Arrow- Move Right
W  or  Spacebar - Jump (Olly only)
E - Stick Together
R - Restart
Tab - Switch Character
Q - Pause

DISCLAIMER: If the web version is not working for you, try downloading the desktop version!

--- Hints (Highlight to Read) ---

  • Jump and disconnect for a double jump
  • Some shells only need to be touched once to be triggered
  • Shells trigger a change somewhere in the level
